text: Rev. 11/6/23 ax; rev. 12/10/24 ax Temple College Vocational Nursing Program VNSG 1119: Leadership and Professional Development Tentative Course Schedule 2025 Required text: Nursing Leadership, Management, and Professional Practice for the LPN/LVN, 7th ed. by Dahlkemper Module I: Professional Behaviors - Chapters 2, 10, & 11 Week 1 Week 2 Jan 27th (Monday/IPE Tues) Course Introduction & Chapter 2 Chapter 10 & 11 Module 1 Exam Module II: Safe and Professional Practice - Chapters 12, 13, 14 & 16 Week 3 Chapter 12 Week 4 Chapter 13 Week 5 Chapters 14 & 16 Module III: Entry into Practice - Chapters 4, 8 & 9 Week 6 Chapter 4 Week 7 Chapters 8 & 9 Week 8 Final Exam ***This is a tentative schedule and is subject to change*** Feb. 18th Module 2 Exam Mar. 4th Final Exam
